rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Almirall 和 Absci 合作开发人工智能设计的皮肤病疗法专注于医学皮肤病学的全球生物制药公司 Almirall SA 和人工智能药物生成公司 Absci Corporation 今天宣布建立药物发现合作伙伴关系，旨在开发和商业化人工智能设计的疗法，以对抗慢性和衰弱性皮肤病。此次合作将 Absci 的 Integrated Drug Creation™ 平台与 Almirall 的皮肤病学专业知识相结合，旨在为患者提供改变生活的药物，标志着人工智能药物创造又向前迈进了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Almirall-and-Absci-partner-to-develop-AI-Designed-therapeutics-for-dermatological-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Almirall-and-Absci-partner-to-develop-AI-Designed-therapeutics-for-dermatological-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff4cb685-2f1b-4b6c-ab71-d57365a52585 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 05:08:00 -0500 Almirall and Absci partner to develop AI-designed therapeutics for dermatological diseases
学者心理健康文章获得跨党派​​好评曼彻斯特大学学者发表了大量文章，探讨了心理健康状况不佳的复杂性，并提出了缓解患者困境的政策建议，受到了议会两院政治家的跨党派赞扬。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Academics-mental-health-articles-gain-cross-party-praise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Academics-mental-health-articles-gain-cross-party-praise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acd46ef6-e7f6-46c3-b216-e8cfa88dea1c Mon, 20 Nov 2023 05:05:00 -0500 Academics' mental health articles gain cross-party praise
澳大利亚每 4 分钟就有 1 人因头部受伤而住院澳大利亚健康与福利研究所 (AIHW) 发布的一份报告显示，2020-21 年，头部受伤导致 142,000 例住院病例，相当于每 4 分钟就有 1 例住院病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Head-injuries-lead-to-1-hospitalization-every-4-minutes-in-Australia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Head-injuries-lead-to-1-hospitalization-every-4-minutes-in-Australia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fba4e561-aa27-47a9-a25e-da7172f94aa4 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 05:00:00 -0500 Head injuries lead to 1 hospitalization every 4 minutes in Australia
澳大利亚启动首个人工智能月，以促进负责任的人工智能发展澳大利亚首届人工智能 (AI) 月今天启动，呼吁澳大利亚人帮助塑造和规划他们想要看到的人工智能未来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Australia-launches-first-ever-AI-month-to-promote-responsible-AI-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Australia-launches-first-ever-AI-month-to-promote-responsible-AI-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac152130-ea5d-412e-927b-e07b76ed4269 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 04:57:00 -0500 Australia launches first-ever AI month to promote responsible AI development
开发出从纯骨髓中提取间充质干细胞的突破性技术来自新加坡麻省理工学院研究与技术联盟 (SMART) 制造个性化医疗关键分析 (CAMP) 跨学科研究小组 (IRG) 的研究人员，该联盟是麻省理工学院在新加坡的研究企业，与科学、技术和研究机构合作 ( A*STAR）生物加工技术研究所（BTI）和国立大学卫生系统（NUHS）开发了一项突破性技术，能够直接从纯骨髓中提取间充质干细胞（MSC） - 也称为骨髓抽吸物（BMA），间充质干细胞的关键来源——无需稀释。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Groundwriting-technology-development-to-extract-mesenchymal-stem-cells-from-pure-bone-marrow.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Groundwriting-technology-development-to-extract-mesenchymal-stem-cells-from-pure-bone-marrow.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03b44def-e9e4-4b2e-8bae-6f514fc99df6 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 04:52:00 -0500 Groundbreaking technology developed to extract mesenchymal stem cells from pure bone marrow
分析发现 370 万工作年龄人口患有限制工作的健康状况健康基金会的新分析显示，目前有 370 万人（占工作年龄人口的 12%）正在工作，并报告称其患有“工作限制”健康状况，从而限制了他们可以从事的工作类型或工作量。过去十年中这一数字增加了 140 万人，几乎与因工作限制而没有工作的人数相当。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Analysis-finds-37-million-working-age-people-with-work-limiting-health-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Analysis-finds-37-million-working-age-people-with-work-limiting-health-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13ebee70-99fd-487f-8040-ea6449c1b4b4 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 04:46:00 -0500
拉夫堡大学将为数百名 NHS 专业人员提供患者安全课程拉夫堡大学正在与英国国民医疗服务体系 (NHS England) 合作，为数百名医疗保健专业人员提供学习机会，以提高患者安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Loughborough-University-to-deliver-patent-safety-course-to-hundreds-of-NHS-professionals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Loughborough-University-to-deliver-patent-safety-course-to-hundreds-of-NHS-professionals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5d2d8af-d2aa-4ed9-8978-aa0126cc5e05 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 04:44:00 -0500 Loughborough University to deliver patient safety course to hundreds of NHS professionals
中年高胆固醇与晚年痴呆有关越来越多的研究发现，中年时期较高的胆固醇水平与晚年的阿尔茨海默病和痴呆症之间存在显着联系。一位领先的检测专家表示，今年圣诞节将高脂肪食物换成更健康的食物，并立即进行检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/High-cholesterol-in-midlife-linked-to-later-life-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/High-cholesterol-in-midlife-linked-to-later-life-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=440b5251-b695-4910-8ee1-b74a0ced06cc Mon, 20 Nov 2023 04:40:00 -0500 High cholesterol in midlife linked to later-life dementia
创新的艺术素养计划有望减少青少年抑郁和焦虑一项随机对照试验，旨在评估课前艺术素养干预措施在减少高中生焦虑和抑郁方面的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Innovative-arts-literacy-program-shows-promise-in-reducing-youth-depression-and-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Innovative-arts-literacy-program-shows-promise-in-reducing-youth-depression-and-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7ddcbc5-dbd2-4874-b97e-789b464e83f9 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 04:30:00 -0500 Innovative arts-literacy program shows promise in reducing youth depression and anxiety
结核病治疗的突破：TB-PRACTECAL 试验揭示了新口服疗法的功效TB-PRACTECAL 临床试验结果评估了口服贝达喹啉的有效性和安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Breakthrough-in-tuberculosis-treatment-TB-PRACTECAL-trial-reveals-efficacy-of-new-oral-regimen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Breakthrough-in-tuberculosis-treatment-TB-PRACTECAL-trial-reveals-efficacy-of-new-oral-regimen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca2a0914-5cc4-4ca4-bfbf-59b27dbc2c53 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 04:07:00 -0500 Breakthrough in tuberculosis treatment: TB-PRACTECAL trial reveals efficacy of new oral regimen
